incident_updates.body:
EOS infrastructure update - January 20, 2026 at 06:00 UTC

We will be updating the network infrastructure for Epic Online Services to improve security and resilience.
- Duration: Up to 1 hour.
- Impact: We do not expect significant player impact. Some clients may experience brief connection retries.
- Actions for developers: Generally, no action is required. Teams using certificate pinning, long-lived DNS caching, or strict IP allowlists for *.epicgames.dev should review their configuration ahead of time.

We will monitor the rollout closely and provide updates here when the maintenance concludes.

affected_components.name: Epic Online Services - Epic Account Services - Authentication
Epic Online Services - Game Services - Authentication
Epic Online Services - Player Data Storage
Epic Online Services - Epic Games Store Ecommerce
